Comment: Special Reward Skill Faction Large Icon

Values[1]: In opposition to conventional art schools, this school captures human perception and experience in a particular moment with light and shadow. Teaches <color=#fa5826>fire-related</color> abilities.
Values[2]: An expression of ethnic cultures. The scripts and music contain ethnic music elements. Teaches <color=#168eec>lightning-related</color> abilities.
Values[3]: Represents subject matter truthfully and scientifically. Teaches <color=#13cfb7>ice-related</color> abilities.
Values[4]: Depicts the subjective world through objective, passionate and exaggerated methods. Teaches abilities <color=#f13c3c>related to Sharp Lance</color>.
Values[5]: Expresses the eternal nature of subjects through abstract and distorting depictions of reality. Teaches abilities <color=#cc68c1>related to pulling and black hole</color>.
Values[6]: Pays tribute to the principles based in the historical cultures with emphasis on historical reference. Respects the reign of monarch. Teaches <color=#ff8d1e>energy-related</color> abilities.
Values[7]: The passionate, vibrant movements of this school laid the foundation of many culture forms in later generations. Teaches abilities <color=#8fcf06>related to levitating machines</color>.
